code: import React from'react';import axios from'axios';import'../styles/Product.css';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Product=_ref=>{let{product}=_ref;const user=JSON.parse(localStorage.getItem('user'));const handleAddToCart=async()=>{if(!user){alert('Please log in to add products to your cart.');return;}try{await axios.post("http://localhost:8080/api/cart/".concat(user.id,"/add"),{productId:product.id,quantity:1},{headers:{'Authorization':"Bearer ".concat(localStorage.getItem('token'))}});alert('Producto agregado al carrito');}catch(error){console.error('Error adding product to cart',error);}};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"product-card",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:product.image_url,alt:product.name,className:"product-image"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{children:product.name}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{children:["$",product.price]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:handleAddToCart,children:"Agregar al Carrito"})]});};export default Product;
